sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>We don't need availability summarizer trigger from SPM v1 since its calculated as part of performance calculation</description> <name>Delete availability trigger</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var availTrigger = new GlideRecord('sys_trigger'); availTrigger.get('402cdf0c0a0a0b2b0029bfaea25969f3'); availTrigger.deleteRecord();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>yetesh.chaudhary</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-12-05 07:21:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>37871673cb8223008c061aeb034c9c58</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete availability trigger</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Service Portfolio Management Foundation" source="com.snc.service_portfolio">9fe738ac3cb1311068bcf327dfe37ff1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_37871673cb8223008c061aeb034c9c58</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>yetesh.chaudhary</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-12-05 07:21:45</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
